channel.title: +अधिदैवम् on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पणयः
channel.description: Recent content in +अधिदैवम् on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पणयः

item.title: सविता
item.description: savitR SunEarthGravityGrid MT’s summary Clestial lights Most believe that he is none other than the Sun of our solar system. Yet, the RV is quite clear about him not being the same as the sun. The sun is merely one manifestation of his activity. In particular, he is specifically linked to the celestial lights, like the rays of the sun (e.g. RV 1.35.7; 4.14.2; 5.81.4; 10.
